name: Alex Cross
description: A homicide detective is pushed to the brink of his moral and physical limits as he tangles with a ferociously skilled hired killer who specializes in torture and pain.

review.author: smithereenie
review.heading: Interesting to see a different side of Matthew Fox
review.reviewBody: Being that I grew up watching party of five, I never could've pictured Matthew Fox (the good-looking older responsible brother in POF) being a psychopath but I felt he played the character well.\n\nWas it a blockbuster, no but it still held my attention. Maybe that's because I didn't have any expectations going in as I never read the books. Bottom line is, I was entertained and have seen far worse.

keywords: interrupted sex,scene of the crime,character name as title,woman wears a bikini,woman on top sex
